User Auth Views Module¶

user_auth.views.authenticate_user(request)[source]¶

Verifies the user’s login credentials, then redirects them to the polls page if successful

Parameters:

request – HTTP request object.

Returns:

Rendered user template if successful, else login template.

Return type:

Django Reverse Object

user_auth.views.register(request)[source]¶

Renders registration page and redirects user to login page if successful

Parameters:

request – HTTP request object.

Returns:

Rendered registration template to for new users.

Return type:

Django Render Object

user_auth.views.show_user(request)[source]¶

Renders the welcome page

Parameters:

request – HTTP request object.

Returns:

Rendered user template containing their details.

Return type:

Django Render Object

user_auth.views.user_login(request)[source]¶

Renders the login page

Parameters:

request – HTTP request object.

Returns:

Rendered login template.

Return type:

Django Render Object
